sourceDesc: BF Version of Qn's AltStore Repo

sourceApps.appDesc:
- RedditFilter & RedditSideloadFix are made by u/level3tjg!!!
- Filter out unwanted content from your Reddit feed. Configurable from in-app settings.
- Requires iOS 14.0 or later.
- Source code: 
https://github.com/level3tjg/RedditFilter
https://github.com/level3tjg/RedditSideloadFix

Rocket not only gives you the features that are missing from Instagram, but it also gives you full control over the app.

Learn how to make your own Rocket for Instagram iPA here: https://github.com/qnblackcat/IGSideloadFix

FEATURES
- Browse home feed in grid layout.
- Show following status in Profile.
- Download posts from your feed.
- Repost any post from your feed.
- Long press on posts to zoom.
- Copy post captions from your feed.
- Download all Stories on Instagram.
- Save videos from IGTV.
- View Stories without notifying others.
- Mute and unmute Stories.
- Disable Auto-Advance in Stories.
- Hide Stories from your feed.
- Play in high quality on Mobile Data.
- Long press on profile photo to zoom.
- Disable read receipts in DM.
- Disable Screenshot notifications in DM.
- Disable Read Receipts in DM.

Learn how to make your own Rocket for Instagram iPA here: https://github.com/qnblackcat/IGSideloadFix

Unfortunately, AltStore can not handle two (or more) applications that have the same bundle ID (uYouPlus, CercubePlus and CercubePlus (Legacy)). I have no other choice except to modify the bundle ID of CercubePlus (Legacy). Thus, you won't be able to install CercubePlus (Legacy) directly through AltStore. You still can download the IPA like normal though.

Full infomation about CercubePlus (Legacy) is available on my Github: https://github.com/qnblackcat/CercubePlus/tree/iOS-12/

Credits: Please keep the Credits if you re-up CercubePlus (Legacy)! 
- Alfhaily for Cercube.
- Galactic-Dev for the original iSponsorBlockLegacy, @Luewii for his fork of iSponsorBlock (which works in jailed mode).
- PoomSmart for YouRememberCaption, YTClassicVideoQuality, YTNoCheckLocalNetwork, YTSystemAppearance, and Return YouTube Dislike.
- level3tjg for YTNoHoverCards.

Known issues:
- YTUHD is removed because most iOS 12 devices don't support VP9 codec (Hardware restriction).
- iOS 12 doesn't have the built-in Picture in Picture mode like iOS 14+, so YouPiP must be removed as well.
- Hide Cast button may not work.
- YouPiP (iOS 14.0 - 14.4.2): due to Apple's fault, you may encounter the speedup-bug as described here. The bug also happens when you try to play multi-sources of sound at the same time. Enable Legacy PiP is a workaround. Note that Legacy PiP removes UHD quality and breaks the default video quality feature of uYou. Use it at your own risk!

Wolf is an updated Facebook tweak with powerful features! You can access the tweak settings in Facebook's settings page.

Learn how to make your own IPA of Facebook Wolf here: https://github.com/qnblackcat/FBSideloadfix

FEATURES:
• No feed ads
• No story ads
• Disable marking messages as seen
• Disable typing status in messages
• Disable marking stories
• Disable auto-advance in stories
• Save Story images and videos
• Save Feed videos by long-pressing the video

NOTES:
• I'm not the developer of Wolf. This is not an official version of Wolf.
• Michael Lema, the developer of Wolf,  hasn't updated Wolf for a while. Expect some features may not work correctly.
Identity type to use for appdb PRO

Unfortunately, AltStore can not handle two applications that have the same bundle ID (uYou+ and Cercube+). I have no other choice except to modify CercubePlus's bundle ID. As a result, you won't be able to install CercubePlus directly through AltStore. You still can download the IPA like normal though.

Credits: Please keep the Credits if you re-up CercubePlus! 
- https://github.com/qnblackcat/CercubePlus#credits

Full infomation about CercubePlus (Cercube+) is available on my Github: https://github.com/qnblackcat/CercubePlus/

uYouPlus is a modified version of uYou with some extra features! (requires iOS 13.0 and later).

Full infomation about uYouPlus (uYou+) is available on my Github: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/

Credits: Please keep the Credits if you re-up uYouPlus! 
https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus#credits

Attention:
- If you like the app, considering support the developers!
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter stuttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality. However, this should not happen if you use TrollStore.
- Unless you're using TrollStore, deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App) simply will not work.

Known issues:
- uYou's issues: https://github.com/MiRO92/uYou-for-YouTube/issues
- uYouPlus's issues: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus
